General.Name: Wasu Media Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Wasu Media Holding Co.,Ltd engages in the media and cable network businesses in China. It offers interactive TV, mobile TV, broadband network, Internet TV, advertising, and other media information services. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Genuine Unicom New Material Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wasu Media Holding Co.,Ltd in October 2012. Wasu Media Holding Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
